name: UltraBook Pro 13
description: Sleek and powerful laptop with a 13-inch Retina display, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals on the go.

name: QuantumPhone X
description: Next-gen smartphone with an edge-to-edge OLED display, AI-powered camera, and all-day battery life.

name: Acoustic Beats Headphones
description: Immersive over-ear headphones with noise-cancellation and crystal-clear audio. Enjoy your music like never before.

name: ProShot DSLR Camera
description: Professional-grade DSLR camera with 4K video recording, 24MP sensor, and interchangeable lenses for stunning photography.

name: Compact Camcorder 2.0
description: Easy-to-use compact camcorder with full HD recording and optical zoom. Perfect for capturing family moments.

name: Gaming Laptop Beast
description: High-performance gaming laptop with dedicated graphics, fast refresh rate display, and RGB keyboard.

name: SmartWatch Pro
description: Stay connected with this sleek smartwatch featuring health tracking, notifications, and long battery life.

name: Wireless Earbuds Elite
description: Compact and powerful wireless earbuds with touch controls and a portable charging case.

name: GoPro HERO 13
description: Waterproof Action Camera with 5.3K60 Video, 27MP Photo + Compatability with HB-Series Lenses.

name: PixelView Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with a sleek, bezel-less design and vibrant color accuracy. Perfect for creative work or immersive entertainment.

name: AuraBook 15
description: Lightweight and powerful laptop with a 15-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a long-lasting battery for all-day productivity.

name: Nova S22 Smartphone
description: Powerful smartphone with a 120Hz AMOLED display, triple-camera system, and blazing-fast 5G connectivity. Available in multiple colors.

name: Stratos Phone
description: High-end smartphone with a titanium frame, a stunning LTPO display, and the latest A16 Bionic chip for unparalleled performance.

name: SoundSphere Headphones
description: Wireless headphones with spatial audio and adaptive EQ for a truly personalized listening experience. Up to 30 hours of battery life.

name: AudioFlex Earbuds
description: Sweat-resistant wireless earbuds with a secure fit and clear, balanced sound. Ideal for workouts and daily commutes.

name: EOS R5 Camera
description: Professional mirrorless camera with 8K video recording, 45MP full-frame sensor, and advanced autofocus. The ultimate tool for content creators.

name: MiniDrone Pro
description: Compact and foldable drone with a 4K camera, intelligent flight modes, and a 30-minute flight time. Capture breathtaking aerial shots with ease.

name: ChronoWatch Classic
description: Elegant smartwatch with a classic design, fitness tracking, and a bright AMOLED display. Track your goals in style.

name: Zenith Z-Watch
description: Premium smartwatch with advanced health sensors, GPS, and cellular connectivity. Stay connected and informed, even without your phone.

name: OmniWatch
description: All-in-one smartwatch for the active user. Features a durable design, heart rate monitoring, and a built-in compass for your adventures.
